Traits.Name: Razor-Fin
Traits.Content: The Angelfish has razor-sharp fins that give it advantage on attack rolls using its fins.

Traits.Name: Hovering Grace
Traits.Content: The Angelfish can hover in place and is immune to opportunity attacks as long as it remains in the air.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Angelfish makes two attacks with its Razor-Fin and one attack with its Flesh Drain.

Actions.Name: Razor-Fin
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be bleeding, taking 5 (1d10) damage at the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Flesh Drain
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have its movement speed reduced by half until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Riptide Burst
Actions.Content: The Angelfish releases a surge of water around it in a 15-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw, taking 30 (4d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The Angelfish can use this ability once every 5 rounds.
